body:

ahh ok didn't know about the timer - cool
if u see any quick hits on the graphics oriented pls submit a fix
I'll fix up some of the others
i think this is still worth doing to see if we have any long tests that are too long

We have durations now: https://travis-ci.org/pandas-dev/pandas/jobs/446018323#L2867

Right now it's hardcoded in `addopts` of `setup.cfg`. We may want to move it to the actual test scripts, so that it doesn't show up under, e.g. the doctests.
